# Wings of Air, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Winged creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 240

*You place your hand on the creature’s shoulders, and a warm yellow radiance infuses it, spreading out to the tips of its wings.*

This spell functions like *[[Wings of Air (Spell)|wings of air]]*, except that the creature’s maneuverability improves by two grades—from clumsy to average, poor to good, or average to perfect.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* This spell does not stack with the *[[Aerial Alacrity (Spell)|aerial alacrity]]* spell.
